title: (x) Does anyone know? / Infographics on mattkursmark.com - Gotham Rounded {self (Matheus)}
content:
Can anyone tell me if this is Gotham Rounded typeface? (please check link and see slide number 4, where says "Circadian Rhythms In Sync")!

[http://www.mattkursmark.com/print-infographics.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014145251/http:/www.mattkursmark.com/print-infographics.php "http://www.mattkursmark.com/print-infographics.php")

(I don't know how to make the attached jpeg file visible in the body text window!)

By the way, beautiful infographics!

Thanks!
author: Matheus D.

comments.content:
Hi Matheus,  
yes, it is. Here’s a link: [Gotham Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014145251/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100030).  
F  
——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014145251/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")
